data.eml:eml: A new species of black fly with a yellow thorax in the genus Prosimulium (Diptera: Simuliidae) in Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Takaoka, Hiroyuki, Saito, Katsumi, Adler, Peter H., Baba, Minoru (2018): A new species of black fly with a yellow thorax in the genus Prosimulium (Diptera: Simuliidae) in Japan. Zootaxa 4524 (4): 489-495, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4524.4.6
